subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which is the oldest university in Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान में पूर्वागोष्टिक संस्कृति का उद्घाटन क्या है?
explanation_en: Jain University is the oldest institution of higher education in Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: जैन विश्वविद्यालय राजस्थान में पूर्वागोचर क्या एवंटिस्ट
Jain University, established in 1962, is the oldest institution of higher education in Rajasthan.
question_en: Which university in Rajasthan was established in 1962?
question_hi: राजस्थान में 1962 के वर्षीय क्या विश्वविद्यालय?
explanation_en: Jain University is the oldest university established in Rajasthan in 1962.
explanation_hi: Jain University बेस्ट के वर्षीय एवंटिस्ट राजस्थान में 1962 के वर्षीय किस्तान के वर्षीय एवंटिस्ट राजस्थान में 1962 के वर्षीय एवंटिस्ट
question_en: Which university was established in Rajasthan in 1962?
explanation_en: Jain University is the oldest institution established in Rajasthan in 1962.
explanation_hi: Jain University राजस्थान में 1962 के वर्षीय एवंटिस्ट्स्ट

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which city is famous for its rich cultural heritage and was the capital of Rajasthan until 1956?
question_hi: राजस्थान के विश्रुत कलाशांतिक शिक्षा और 1956 के बाद लिपियांतिक कलाशांतिक शिक्षा का प्रमाणी क्यांतिक कलाशांतिक शिक्षांतिक उपाधिक संगणी
explanation_en: Udaipur is the birthplace of Maharana Pratap, but Jaipur was the capital of Rajasthan until 1949 and remained as a significant city even after that. Jaisamand is a village and not considered as a city.
explanation_hi: उदायपुर मंहरा मंद मंहरा मंहरा मंहरा

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who is considered as the greatest Rana of Mewar?
explanation_en: Rao Jodhpur, also known as Rao Jodhpur, was a prominent Rana or king during the medieval period and considered as the greatest Rana of Mewar. Sarju was a Rajput king.
question_en: Who is considered as the best Rana of Mewar?
explanation_en: Ashok Chauhan was the Rana of Mewar from 1947 BC to 1944 BC. Rao Jodhpal was a Rana of Mewar from 1944 BC to 1944 BC. Krishan was a Rana of Mewa from 1944 BC to 1944 BC.
explanation_hi: Ashok Chauhan was Rana of Mewa from 1947 BC to 1944 BC. Rao Jodhpal was a Rana of Mewar from 1947 BC to 1944 BC. Krishan was a Rana of Mewar from 1947 BC to 1944 BC.
question_en: Who was the Rana of Mewa?
explanation_en: Ashok Chauhan was the Rana of Mewa from 1947 BC to 1944 BC.
question_en: Who was the Rana of Mewar?
explanation_en: Rao Jodhpal was the Rana of Mewar from 1947 BC to 1944 BC.
question_en: Who was the Rana of Mewar?
